title: Why teachers in South Korea are scared of their pupils, and their parents | CNN
summary: Teachers in South Korea are facing increasing fear and pressure from their students and parents, leading to a rise in teacher suicides. Tens of thousands of teachers have been protesting for more protection and support, following the suicide of a first-grade teacher in July. The protests have prompted the government to take action, with new legislation passed to provide teachers with protection from being sued for child abuse, shift responsibility for complaints to principals, and protect teachers' personal information.

title: Abandoned golf courses are being reclaimed by nature | CNN
summary: Golf courses, known for their large green spaces, are being repurposed into nature reserves to benefit the environment and boost biodiversity. Conservation organizations and local authorities are acquiring abandoned golf courses and restoring them into habitats that support endangered species and protect against climate change. These rewilded spaces have already shown signs of success, with wildlife returning, including migratory birds, bobcats, and threatened species like the western snowy plover.
